title: Kelp frond/zh-CN
data:
**NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！**  
[了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki](/wiki/NetHackWiki:How_to_help/zh-CN "NetHackWiki:How to help/zh-CN")

**[English](/wiki/Kelp_frond "Kelp frond")** • [中文（中国大陆）‎]()

| % [![Kelp frond.png](/images/a/a5/Kelp_frond.png)](/wiki/File:Kelp_frond.png) |                                                                                                        |
| ----------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
| 名称                                                                            | 海藻叶子                                                                                                   |
| 基础价                                                                           | 6 [zm](/wiki/%E9%87%91%E5%B8%81 "金币")                                                                  |
| 营养值                                                                           | [30](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A5%E5%85%BB%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "营养值 (page does not exist)") |
| 食用所需回合数                                                                       | 1                                                                                                      |
| 重量                                                                            | [1](/index.php?title=%E9%87%8D%E9%87%8F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "重量 (page does not exist)")            |
| 行为                                                                            | [绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")         |

**海藻叶子**（kelp frond）是[NetHack](/index.php?title=NetHack/zh-CN\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "NetHack/zh-CN (page does not exist)")中的一种[素食](/index.php?title=%E7%B4%A0%E9%A3%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "素食 (page does not exist)")类[可食用品](/wiki/%E5%8F%AF%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8%E5%93%81 "可食用品")。

[ ]

## Contents

- [1 生成](#.E7.94.9F.E6.88.90)

- [2 描述](#.E6.8F.8F.E8.BF.B0)

- [3 策略](#.E7.AD.96.E7.95.A5)

- [4 历史](#.E5.8E.86.E5.8F.B2)

- [5 Variants](#Variants)

  - [5.1 SLASH'EM](#SLASH.27EM)
  - [5.2 UnNetHack](#UnNetHack)
  - [5.3 SlashTHEM](#SlashTHEM)

- [6 百科文本](#.E7.99.BE.E7.A7.91.E6.96.87.E6.9C.AC)

- [7 引用及注释](#.E5.BC.95.E7.94.A8.E5.8F.8A.E6.B3.A8.E9.87.8A)

## 生成

海藻叶子只会在[水域](/index.php?title=%E6%B0%B4%E5%9F%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "水域 (page does not exist)")类地形（如护城河）内生成[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)，每次可能生成1～2个[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)。每个水池地块有1⁄10的概率生成海藻叶子，每个护城河地块有1⁄30的概率生成海藻叶子[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)。

## 描述

[食用](/wiki/%E9%A3%9F%E7%94%A8 "食用")海藻叶子会获得30[营养值](/index.php?title=%E8%90%A5%E5%85%BB%E5%80%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "营养值 (page does not exist)")。海藻叶子适合于[绝对素食](/index.php?title=%E7%BB%9D%E5%AF%B9%E7%B4%A0%E9%A3%9F\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "绝对素食 (page does not exist)")[行为](/index.php?title=%E8%A1%8C%E4%B8%BA\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "行为 (page does not exist)")。海藻叶子可以用于驯服[草食类](/index.php?title=%E8%8D%89%E9%A3%9F%E7%B1%BB\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "草食类 (page does not exist)")的[家畜](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%B6%E7%95%9C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "家畜 (page does not exist)")怪物，也可以用来喂食草食[宠物](/index.php?title=%E5%AE%A0%E7%89%A9\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "宠物 (page does not exist)")。

## 策略

海藻叶子一般来说没有什么需求度，因为它们的营养价值并不高，而且多数[玩家](/index.php?title=%E7%8E%A9%E5%AE%B6\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "玩家 (page does not exist)")在成功抵达有海藻叶子生成的楼层时一般已经不会有食物短缺的问题。海藻叶子一般的适用场合是作为素食角色的零食，或者用于驯服[马](/index.php?title=%E9%A9%AC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "马 (page does not exist)")作为坐骑。

收集海藻最简单的方法是利用[物品探测](/index.php?title=%E7%89%A9%E5%93%81%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "物品探测 (page does not exist)")或[食物探测](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9F%E7%89%A9%E6%8E%A2%E6%B5%8B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "食物探测 (page does not exist)")找出它们的位置，然后，利用[魔法呼吸](/index.php?title=%E9%AD%94%E6%B3%95%E5%91%BC%E5%90%B8\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "魔法呼吸 (page does not exist)")潜入水下采集，或是[飘浮](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%98%E6%B5%AE\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飘浮 (page does not exist)")或[飞行](/index.php?title=%E9%A3%9E%E8%A1%8C\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "飞行 (page does not exist)")至水域上方，然后用[牛鞭](/wiki/%E7%89%9B%E9%9E%AD "牛鞭")将海藻叶子捞起来。[朱比烈斯的沼泽](/index.php?title=%E6%9C%B1%E6%AF%94%E7%83%88%E6%96%AF%E7%9A%84%E6%B2%BC%E6%B3%BD\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "朱比烈斯的沼泽 (page does not exist)")和[美杜莎岛](/index.php?title=%E7%BE%8E%E6%9D%9C%E8%8E%8E%E5%B2%9B\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "美杜莎岛 (page does not exist)")都有大片的水域，适合采集海藻，但要小心[鳗鱼](/index.php?title=%E9%B3%97%E9%B1%BC\&action=edit\&redlink=1 "鳗鱼 (page does not exist)")。

*以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（[3.7.0](/wiki/3.7.0 "3.7.0")）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。*

根据[commit ff483694](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/commit/ff483694af2cc02c49602656e4af542e68a1df82)，现在牛鞭已不能捞起水里的物品。

## 历史

海藻叶子最初于[NetHack 3.3.0](/wiki/NetHack_3.3.0 "NetHack 3.3.0")加入游戏。

## Variants

**此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。**  
您可以帮助我们[**翻译此页面**](https://nethackwiki.com/index.php?title=Kelp_frond/zh-CN\&action=edit)，但**请勿使用机器翻译**。

### SLASH'EM

[SLASH'EM](/wiki/SLASH%27EM "SLASH'EM") incorporates the [Dungeon Growths](/wiki/Dungeon_Growths "Dungeon Growths") [patch](/wiki/Patch "Patch"), which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater. This also applies to [Hack'EM](/wiki/Hack%27EM "Hack'EM").

### UnNetHack

[UnNetHack](/wiki/UnNetHack "UnNetHack") also incorporates the Dungeon Growths patch, which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater.

### SlashTHEM

In [SlashTHEM](/wiki/SlashTHEM "SlashTHEM"), in addition to the Dungeon Growths patch, kelp fronds can also be randomly generated, and can be sold in general [stores](/wiki/Store "Store"), health food stores and delicatessens.

## 百科文本

I noticed that all the plants were attached to the soil by  
an almost imperceptible bond. Devoid of roots, they seemed  
not to require any nourishment from sand, soil, or pebble.  
All they required was a point of support -- nothing else.  
These plants are self-propagated, and their existence depends  
entirely on the water that supports and nourishes them.  
Most of them do not sprout leaves, but sprout blades of  
various whimsical shapes, and their colors are limited to  
pink, carmine, green, olive, fawn, and brown. I had the  
opportunity to observe once more -- not the dried specimens  
I had studied on the \_Nautilus\_ -- but the fresh, living  
specimens in their native setting.  
        \[ 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea, by Jules Verne ]

## 引用及注释

1. [↑](#cite_ref-1) [src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 905](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mklev.c#L905)
2. [↑](#cite_ref-2) [src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 869](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mkobj.c#L869)
3. [↑](#cite_ref-3) [src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 900](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mklev.c#L900)
4. [↑](#cite_ref-4) [src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 902](https://github.com/NetHack/NetHack/blob/NetHack-3.6.7_Released/src/mklev.c#L902)

[![此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。](/images/f/f7/Nh367-icon.png)](/wiki/NetHackWiki:Next_version "此条目的内容已同步至NetHack 3.6.7。详细信息请点击此处。")
html:
Kelp frond/zh-CN

From NetHackWiki
< Kelp frond
Jump to navigation Jump to search

NetHack 中文 Wiki 需要您的帮助！
了解如何帮助我们完善Wiki

English

 • 中文（中国大陆）‎
%
名称 海藻叶子
基础价 6 zm
营养值 30
食用所需回合数 1
重量 1
行为 绝对素食

海藻叶子（kelp frond）是NetHack中的一种素食类可食用品。

Contents

  • 1 生成
  • 2 描述
  • 3 策略
  • 4 历史
  • 5 Variants
    • 5.1 SLASH'EM
    • 5.2 UnNetHack
    • 5.3 SlashTHEM
  • 6 百科文本
  • 7 引用及注释

生成

海藻叶子只会在水域类地形（如护城河）内生成[1]，每次可能生成1～2个[2]。每个水池地块有1⁄10的概率生成海藻叶子，每个护城河地块有1⁄30的概率生成海藻叶子[3][4]。

描述

食用海藻叶子会获得30营养值。海藻叶子适合于绝对素食行为。海藻叶子可以用于驯服草食类的家畜怪物，也可以用来喂食草食宠物。

策略

海藻叶子一般来说没有什么需求度，因为它们的营养价值并不高，而且多数玩家在成功抵达有海藻叶子生成的楼层时一般已经不会有食物短缺的问题。海藻叶子一般的适用场合是作为素食角色的零食，或者用于驯服马作为坐骑。

收集海藻最简单的方法是利用物品探测或食物探测找出它们的位置，然后，利用魔法呼吸潜入水下采集，或是飘浮或飞行至水域上方，然后用牛鞭将海藻叶子捞起来。朱比烈斯的沼泽和美杜莎岛都有大片的水域，适合采集海藻，但要小心鳗鱼。

以下内容涉及即将到来的版本（3.7.0）之信息。如果该版本已发布，请验证此处信息是否准确，并作出相应修改，以将其并入页面。

根据commit ff483694，现在牛鞭已不能捞起水里的物品。

历史

海藻叶子最初于NetHack 3.3.0加入游戏。

Variants

此条目或段落的部分内容需要翻译。
您可以帮助我们翻译此页面，但请勿使用机器翻译。

SLASH'EM

SLASH'EM incorporates the Dungeon Growths patch, which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater. This also applies to Hack'EM.

UnNetHack

UnNetHack also incorporates the Dungeon Growths patch, which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater.

SlashTHEM

In SlashTHEM, in addition to the Dungeon Growths patch, kelp fronds can also be randomly generated, and can be sold in general stores, health food stores and delicatessens.

百科文本

I noticed that all the plants were attached to the soil by
an almost imperceptible bond. Devoid of roots, they seemed
not to require any nourishment from sand, soil, or pebble.
All they required was a point of support -- nothing else.
These plants are self-propagated, and their existence depends
entirely on the water that supports and nourishes them.
Most of them do not sprout leaves, but sprout blades of
various whimsical shapes, and their colors are limited to
pink, carmine, green, olive, fawn, and brown. I had the
opportunity to observe once more -- not the dried specimens
I had studied on the _Nautilus_ -- but the fresh, living
specimens in their native setting.
        [ 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea, by Jules Verne ]

引用及注释

  1. ↑ src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 905
  2. ↑ src/mkobj.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 869
  3. ↑ src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 900
  4. ↑ src/mklev.c in NetHack 3.6.7, line 902

{{needhelp/zh-CN}}
{{languages}}
{{comestible/zh-CN
  |color=green
  |tile=[[image:kelp frond.png]]

'''海藻叶子'''（kelp frond）是{{cnlink|NetHack}}中的一种[[素食]]类[[可食用品]]。

== 生成 ==
海藻叶子只会在[[水域]]类地形（如护城河）内生成{{refsrc|src/mklev.c|905|nethack=3.6.7}}，每次可能生成1{{波浪线}}2个{{refsrc|src/mkobj.c|869|nethack=3.6.7}}。每个水池地块有{{frac|10}}的概率生成海藻叶子，每个护城河地块有{{frac|30}}的概率生成海藻叶子{{refsrc|src/mklev.c|900|nethack=3.6.7}}{{refsrc|src/mklev.c|902|nethack=3.6.7}}。

== 描述 ==
[[食用]]海藻叶子会获得30[[营养值]]。海藻叶子适合于[[绝对素食]][[行为]]。海藻叶子可以用于驯服[[草食类]]的[[家畜]]怪物，也可以用来喂食草食[[宠物]]。

== 策略 ==
海藻叶子一般来说没有什么需求度，因为它们的营养价值并不高，而且多数[[玩家]]在成功抵达有海藻叶子生成的楼层时一般已经不会有食物短缺的问题。海藻叶子一般的适用场合是作为素食角色的零食，或者用于驯服[[马]]作为坐骑。

收集海藻最简单的方法是利用[[物品探测]]或[[食物探测]]找出它们的位置，然后，利用[[魔法呼吸]]潜入水下采集，或是[[飘浮]]或[[飞行]]至水域上方，然后用[[牛鞭]]将海藻叶子捞起来。[[朱比烈斯的沼泽]]和[[美杜莎岛]]都有大片的水域，适合采集海藻，但要小心[[鳗鱼]]。

{{upcoming/zh-CN|3.7.0|根据{{commit|ff483694af2cc02c49602656e4af542e68a1df82}}，现在牛鞭已不能捞起水里的物品。}}

== 历史 ==
海藻叶子最初于[[NetHack 3.3.0]]加入游戏。

==Variants==
{{translation/zh-CN|n}}
===SLASH'EM===
[[SLASH'EM]] incorporates the [[Dungeon Growths]] [[patch]], which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater. This also applies to [[Hack'EM]].

===UnNetHack===
[[UnNetHack]] also incorporates the Dungeon Growths patch, which allows kelp fronds to multiply while underwater.

===SlashTHEM===
In [[SlashTHEM]], in addition to the Dungeon Growths patch, kelp fronds can also be randomly generated, and can be sold in general [[store]]s, health food stores and delicatessens.

== 百科文本 ==
{{encyclopedia|
I noticed that all the plants were attached to the soil by 
an almost imperceptible bond.  Devoid of roots, they seemed
not to require any nourishment from sand, soil, or pebble. 
All they required was a point of support -- nothing else.
These plants are self-propagated, and their existence depends 
entirely on the water that supports and nourishes them.
Most of them do not sprout leaves, but sprout blades of
various whimsical shapes, and their colors are limited to
pink, carmine, green, olive, fawn, and brown.  I had the 
opportunity to observe once more -- not the dried specimens
I had studied on the _Nautilus_ -- but the fresh, living
specimens in their native setting.
        [ 20,000 Leagues Under the Sea, by Jules Verne ]
}}
